CustomField.description: Calculates elapsed time between start and finish in days
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( FinishDateTime__c ) ) , IF(FinishDateTime__c - StartDateTime__c > 0 , TEXT( FLOOR( FinishDateTime__c - StartDateTime__c ) ), "" ), IF(Today() - StartDateTime__c > 0 , TEXT( FLOOR( Today() - StartDateTime__c ) ), "" ))
CustomField.label: Duration (days)
